mapper.select: select nvl(max(group_number), 0) as max_group_num from board
mapper.insert: insert into board (BOARD_NUMBER, WRITER, SUBJECT, EMAIL, CONTENT, PASSWORD, WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, GROUP_NUMBER, SEQUENCE_NUMBER, SEQUENCE_LEVEL) values(board_num_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{subject}, #{email}, #{content}, #{password}, #{writeDate}, #{readCount}, #{groupNumber}, #{sequenceNumber}, #{sequenceLevel})
